headline: Truist Sees Slightly Better Long-Term Earnings Power at M&T Bank (MTB)
summary: M&T Bank Corporation (NYSE:MTB) is included among the 12 Most Profitable Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 20, Truist raised its price target on M&T Bank Corporation (NYSE:MTB) to $230 from $217 and kept a Hold rating after the bank posted a fourth-quarter earnings beat. headline: Street Maintains Confidence in Mastercard Incorporated (MA) on Spending Resilience
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is among the most profitable financial stocks to invest in. On January 20, Truist trimmed the price target on Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) to $609 from $630 and reaffirmed a Buy rating. This is part of the firm’s broader research note previewing the fourth quarter for the fintech group. Earlier on January 13, […]

headline: Block (XYZ): Truist Expects Strong Q4 2025 Results
